meanings.definition: A pattern of squares or stripes in different colors, typically used in clothing or textiles.
meanings.sent1: The dress had lovely overplaids that made it stand out.
meanings.sent2: I bought a scarf with overplaids to match my coat.
meanings.sent3: The overplaids on the shirt clashed with the pants, creating a funny look.
meanings.sent4: Her room was a sea of overplaids, like a patchwork quilt come to life.
meanings.sent5: The overplaids on the curtains added a pop of color to the room.

meanings.definition: To cover or decorate with a pattern of squares or stripes.
meanings.sent1: She decided to overplaids the walls with a bold design.
meanings.sent2: The designer overplaids the sofa with a modern fabric.
meanings.sent3: I will overplaids the gift box with a festive wrapping paper.
meanings.sent4: The artist overplaids the canvas with vibrant colors, creating a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: He loves to overplaids his notebooks with doodles and sketches.

meanings.sent1: She wore an overplaids jacket that caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The room was filled with overplaids decorations for the party.
meanings.sent3: His overplaids outfit was a bit too loud for the event.
meanings.sent4: The overplaids carpet in the living room made it feel cozy and warm.
meanings.sent5: The overplaids design on the car was a bold choice that turned heads.
